description: Wind chimes hanging from the branches of an old cottonwood tree create a pleasant metallic noise with each breeze.  The chimes look bright and new and the tree itself is well pruned.  A small pegasus statue stands facing the path under the tree with a small area for offerings on its pedestal.  The golden stone used to construct the statue is illuminated by a single candle placed in the offering bowl.  As it continues to the east, the path becomes stonier.

Wind chimes hanging from the branches of an old cottonwood tree create a pleasant metallic noise with each breeze.  The chimes look bright and new and the tree itself is well pruned.  A small pegasus statue stands facing the path under the tree with a small area for offerings on its pedestal.  The golden stone used to construct the statue gleams brightly in the sunlight.  As it continues to the east, the path becomes stonier.
title: [The Path to Enlightenment]
